Bathed in soft, natural light from the 2 recessed skylights, the spacious lounge room flows into a separate good sized dining room just off the kitchen and both feature warm, honey-hued spotted gum timber floorboards. There is abundant storage with a huge floor to ceiling built-in wardrobe off the dining room and BIW in every bedroom.
